en.today: You'll make significant progress on your journey toward healing, dear Aries, as the Scorpio moon aspects Venus, Saturn, and the nodes of fate. Meditate on how you can better support yourself now and move forward, altering personal structures to make more room for growth. A glorious grand trine graces our skies this evening when Luna, Mars, and Mercury align. Focus on projects and people that excite the mind and bring passion to your soul, trusting your investments will get rewards. Luck is on your side when Luna enters Sagittarius and aspects Neptune, asking you to expand upon existing dreams. New ideas trickle in once Mercury enters your sign later tonight.

en.today: There will be ample opportunities to connect in meaningful and emotionally mature ways, dear Leo, as the Scorpio moon aspects Venus, Saturn, and the nodes of fate. Consider which relationships could use more understanding or healthier boundaries, putting in the work to cultivate lasting connections. Embrace a few moments of solitude when Luna, Mars, and Mercury form a glorious grand trine this evening. This energy is perfect for soothing hurt feelings while finding ways to empower and support yourself. You'll feel elated and in the mood for excitement once the moon enters Sagittarius and aspects Neptune. Consider wishing upon a star before heading to bed when Mercury enters Aries.

en.today: Use your influence to promote love and togetherness, dearest Taurus, as the Scorpio moon aligns with Venus, Saturn, and the nodes of fate. Build bridges by discussing collaborations, making introductions, and spreading positive messages. A rare grand trine graces our skies when Luna, Mars, and Mercury align this evening, creating an environment where emotions can flow freely to assist quests rooted in finding love and happiness. Negotiate for what you want once Luna enters Sagittarius and aspects Neptune, and consider asking for just a bit more than you're comfortable with. You'll feel a shift once Mercury enters Aries tonight, unleashing the deep thinker within.

en.today: Take credit for your many accomplishments, dear Gemini, as the Scorpio moon aligns with Venus, Saturn, and the nodes of fate. You'll feel inspired to go above and beyond when tackling tasks, which can help you gain great admiration from colleagues and peers. Push for financial opportunity when a grand trine graces our skies this evening, showing passion for the work you do. Carve out some time for connection once Luna enters Sagittarius and aspects Neptune, putting you in the mood for love and community. Reflect on any messages you wish to spread once Mercury enters Aries tonight.
